June 2019 - Oct 2019 ‚úàÔ∏è Visiting University of Toronto and working with Jeseph Jay Williams. Â§èÊ¢¶ (Meng XIA, Iris) | Dream Lab Assistant Professor @ CSE, Texas A&M University. I lead the Dream Lab and welcome to join our research team if you are interested in human-AI interaction, data visualization, and education technology. Please email: mengxia@tamu.edu me. üòÄ I received my PhD üéì in Aug 2020 from the Hong Kong University of Science and Technology. I was cosupervised by Prof. Huamin Qu and Prof. Xiaojuan Ma. Previously, I was a Postdoctoral Faculty at CMU, HCII, working with Prof. Vincent Aleven and at KAIST, KIXLAB, working with Prof. Juho Kim. Research Topics My research background mainly focuses on Human-AI Interaction, Data Visualization, and Education Technology. My current research focuses on creating systems for adaptive learning/teaching using visual analytics, and other emerging techniques (e.g., NLP, AR/VR).
